mapper.select: select count(*) as "count" from msg_receive where receiver_no = #{empNo} and status = 'Y'
select count(*) as "count" from msg_send where sender_no = #{empNo} and status = 'Y'

select receive_msg_no , s.send_msg_no , sender_no , emp_name , msg_content , to_char(send_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "send_date" , to_char(read_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') as "read_date" , r.status as "status" from msg_receive r join msg_send s on (r.send_msg_no = s.send_msg_no) join employee on (sender_no = emp_no) where r.status = 'Y' and receiver_no = #{receiveNo} order by send_date desc
select emp_no , emp_name , e.team_code , team_name from employee e join team t on (e.team_code = t.team_code) where emp_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by emp_name
mapper.insert: insert into msg_send ( send_msg_no , sender_no , msg_content , send_date , status ) values ( seq_smsgno.nextval , #{senderNo} , #{msgContent} , sysdate , 'Y' )
insert into msg_receive ( receive_msg_no , send_msg_no , receiver_no , status ) values ( seq_rmsgno.nextval , seq_smsgno.currval , #{receiverNo} , 'Y' )
mapper.select: select receive_msg_no , sender_no , emp_name , team_name , msg_content , to_char(send_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mm') as "send_date" , read_date , r.status as "status" from msg_send s join employee on (sender_no = emp_no) join team using(team_code) join msg_receive r on (r.send_msg_no = s.send_msg_no) where r.status = 'Y' and receiver_no = #{receiverNo} and s.send_msg_no = #{sendMsgNo}

select s.send_msg_no , receiver_no , emp_name , msg_content , to_char(send_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "send_date" , to_char(read_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') as "read_date" , s.status as "status" from msg_send s join msg_receive r on (r.send_msg_no = s.send_msg_no) join employee on (receiver_no = emp_no) where s.status = 'Y' and sender_no = #{senderNo} order by send_date desc
